title: Trump in U.N. speech calls on nations to reject Iran's 'blood lust'
text:
Trump in U.N. speech calls on nations to reject Iran's 'blood lust'

Commodities 57 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 00:40)

Trump in U.N. speech calls on nations to reject Iran's 'blood lust' UNITED NATIONS, Sept 24 (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday called on nations around the world to tighten the economic noose around Iran's economy, saying no country should support Iran's "blood lust." "All nations have a duty to act," Trump told the United Nations General Assembly. "No responsible government should subsidize Iran's blood lust. As long as Iran's menacing behavior continues, sanctions will not be lifted. They will be tightened."
